description: This file defines API constants, specifically the base URL for network requests in a Flutter app, with comments explaining different deployment scenarios.

classes.name: ApiConstants
classes.description: Contains static constants related to API configuration, notably 'apiBaseUrl'.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: A static constant String initialized via environment variable, defaulting to 'http://10.0.2.2:3001', representing the base URL for backend API calls.
